news.title: Bessent sees trade deal likely with China before November deadline on reciprocal tariffs
news.summary: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent appeared Tuesday on CNBC's "Squawk Box" program. He said the U.S. is working to improve the economy and create jobs.

news.title: Trump's Fed pressure campaign will lead to higher inflation, weaker growth, according to CNBC survey
news.summary: 41% of respondents surveyed believe that the president's actions are directly aimed at eliminating the Fed's independence. 41% say they are designed to limit them.

news.title: Meta Connect 2025: AI-powered smart glasses take center stage
news.summary: Meta will unveil its smart glasses at its Connect event. Analysts and investors will be watching how the public responds to Meta's big bet on smart glasses.

news.title: Trump's willingness to let TikTok go dark motivated China to make deal, Bessent says
news.summary: President Donald Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping are expected to speak Friday to finalize the TikTok deal. Trump and Xi will discuss the future of U.S.-China relations.

news.title: OpenAI hires former xAI CFO as Altman-Musk rivalry escalates
news.summary: OpenAI has hired former xAI finance chief Mike Liberatore as business finance offer. He will be responsible for managing the company's soaring compute spending.

news.title: Even a Tesla Model Y safety probe can’t stop the stock’s rally
news.summary: Tesla’s stock is on track for its sixth day of gains. Despite a probe into inoperable doors on 174,290 Model Ys.

news.title: The hurdles are low for another 10% gain for the S&P 500, says this Wall Street veteran
news.summary: The economy and earnings will keep stocks afloat, says Jonathan Golub, chief equity strategist at Seaport Research Partners. Golub: Count on earnings and the economy to keep stock prices afloat.

news.title: Retail sales are strong for the third month in a row. Economy still seems to be in pretty good shape.
news.summary: Retail sales rose at a brisk pace in August for the third month in a row. U.S. households continue to spend at healthy levels despite worries about lingering inflation.

news.title: Markets are pricing in three rate cuts by year-end. Why the Fed might agree.
news.summary: A rate cut at the September Fed meeting looks like a done deal. Be careful with stocks and watch the dollar. A rate cut is likely to happen at the Fed meeting.

news.title: Trump revives call to ditch quarterly earnings — and this time, the SEC may listen
news.summary: Trump wants to allow U.S. businesses to do the same. European companies already report twice yearly. Trump wants to make it easier for businesses to be transparent.
